comment._content: Charles H. Betts, editor of the Lyons (N.Y.) Republican, was a commentator on political issues who conducted a correspondence with Theodore Roosevelt. In 1913 he published a book, THE NAKED TRUTH, Vital Issues Before the Country Clearly Analyzed and Discussed. The text was a speech he had delivered in 1912, during the U. S. Presidential campaign. The text is now available on Google Books, where it is accompanied by this photograph.
